document_data.name: Merethyl's Ministrations
document_data.mainbody: '''Merethyl's Ministrations''' was the most expensive and luxurious public bath house found in the city of [[Myth Drannor]] ''circa'' the midâ€“7{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The establishment was built in the [[Myth Drannor/Kerradunath|Kerradunath]] district of the city, where the [[Street of Song]] intersected with [[Srinshee's Stroll]].
document_data.Structure: This exquisite structure was built as an adapted tree-dwelling, utilizing the boughs and branches as the form for its open-air [[ivory]] bathing pools. It stood three-stories tall, with the first level built some {{SI|12|ft}} above street level, with a floating disc that carried patrons to a main entrance nearly nearly {{SI|30|ft}} above that.
document_data.Services: Entering into the main structure from above, patrons received an experience that was the epitome of decadence and extravagant pleasure.
